titleStmt.title: Ṭbetis sulta maṭiane - Synodal Records from Ṭbeti
ტბეთის სულთა მატიანე

editionStmt.edition: Electronic edition based on printed source

msContents.summary: Synodal records containing commemorative prayers for deceased individuals and their families

projectDesc.p: Electronic edition of Georgian synodal records with structured markup of personal names, relationships, and manuscript references

editorialDecl.p: Abbreviations resolved wherever possible. Editorial additions in square brackets. Manuscript damage indicated with hash marks.

namespace.name: http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0
namespace.tagUsage: Personal name with type and relationship attributes

Line break with manuscript and edition references

revisionDesc.change: TEI markup with structured person encoding
